Articles.Content:
How do you call a jet engine powered by a pig?

Porkjet.

And how to you call a Porkjet with a really large intake?

Airhog.

I have posted this one somewhere in the Forum before.

Why was the tree upset? Because it was feeling self drought.
What font is alphabet soup? Times New Ramen, of course...
I tried to ride skis through grass once. It was *friction impossible!*
BREAKING: Duracell bunny facing battery charges.

Ah dang it! I'm to get a post on every thread on the front page of this section....and I can't think of a pun! Umm....crap....if I post on this thread without giving at least one pun, I could get....pun-ished. I did it!

What does a blade of grass do when it's sleepy?

It *lawns.*

92800 (i wonder about this one localization ... pun(s) localization is such a pain for translators ...)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-05T08:58:18Z" title="11/05/2016 08:58  AM" data-short="7 yr">November 5, 2016</time> by WinkAllKerb''**
Replacing broken windows is a pane...
If an earthquake ran for president, it'd win by a landslide.

> 
> 
> 11 minutes ago, cubinator said:
> 
> 
> If an earthquake ran for president, it'd win by a landslide.
> 

And that would really shake a bunch of people up...

> 
> 
> 18 hours ago, adsii1970 said:
> 
> 
> And that would really shake a bunch of people up...
> 

Not our fault

> 
> 
> 8 minutes ago, Xorth Tanovar said:
> 
> 
> Not our fault
> 

Spare me your "fault" lines... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")
Hey, the quake didn't affect me. I took shelter in the stationary store...
I had a bite of pi at lunch. Now I'm all irrational.

The guy that jumped off that bridge in Paris must have been in Seine.

I'm a big fan of renewable energy.

I couldn't get a slot at the library for the meeting, it's completely booked.

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:") 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-10T19:58:17Z" title="11/10/2016 07:58  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 10, 2016</time> by TheEpicSquared**

> 
> 
> On 11/6/2016 at 4:29 PM, adsii1970 said:
> 
> 
> And that would really shake a bunch of people up...
> 

Yeah, it'd win a lot of toss-up states...

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, CliftonM said:
> 
> 
> Yeah, it'd win a lot of toss-up states...
> 

Or tossed-up lunches...

How did I get out of Iraq?

Iran. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

I just thought of another one:

Once my friend's "x" asked me, ""y" is algebra so difficult?"

I replied, "What are you talking about? It's e-"z"!"

... I'll see myself out, thanks.![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif ":blush:")

[@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/): Yeah, see yourself out but make sure you have some ![black-pi-md.png](http://www.clker.com/cliparts/z/x/c/h/u/8/black-pi-md.png) before you leave!
[@adsii1970](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/89014-adsii1970/) Why so irrational about it?
[@monstah](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/95210-monstah/): I dunno... maybe because I'm just fractional?

[@adsii1970](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/89014-adsii1970/): or just suffering from ADD; I'm divided on the issue myself. But not to worry, you'll get it squared away eventually.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-16T20:21:08Z" title="11/16/2016 08:21  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 16, 2016</time> by Xorth Tanovar**

I don't seem to be able to think up many puns. How this guy does these elaborate ones I don't know...
